original_text: Therefore Abimelech rose early in the morning, and called all his servants, and told all these things in their ears: and the men were sore afraid.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그 날 아침에 일찍이 일어나 모든 종들을 불러 그 모든 일을 말하여 들려 주니 그들이 심히 두려워하였더라

sentences.original_text: Therefore Abimelech rose early in the morning
and told all these things in their ears
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 귀에 이 모든 일을 말하였으며

sentences.original_text: and the men were sore afraid
